uidu.mentions.error.defaultAction.description: Default advised action when an error occurs
uidu.mentions.error.defaultAction.message: Try again in a few seconds

uidu.mentions.error.defaultHeadline.description: Error message shown when there is an error communicating with backend

uidu.mentions.error.differentText.description: Enter different text message when a forbidden error occurs

uidu.mentions.error.loginAgain.description: Login again message when there is an authentication error occurs
uidu.mentions.error.loginAgain.message: Try logging out then in again

uidu.mentions.mentions.team.meantion.hig.description: Closes the highlight component when this button is clicked. This text for the tooltip of that button

uidu.mentions.mentions.team.member.50plu.description: Byline to show the number of members in the team when the number exceeds 50
Byline to show the number of members in the team when the number exceeds 50 and also includes the current user

uidu.mentions.mentions.team.member.count.description: Byline to show the number of members in the team when the current user is not a member of the team
Byline to show the number of members in the team when the current user is also a member of the team
uidu.mentions.mentions.team.member.count.message: {0, plural, one {1 member} other {{0} members}}, including you

uidu.mentions.mentions.team.mention.high.description: Description of the highlight shown in the mention tpyeahead. This is related to team mentions
uidu.mentions.mentions.team.mention.high.message: Get everyone on the page with one click. No team?

uidu.mentions.mentions.team.mention.high.description: Team creation link in the description of the highlight shown in the mention tpyeahead. This is related to team mentions
Title of the highlight shown in the mention tpyeahead. This is related to team mentions

uidu.mentions.noAccess.warning.description: Warning message to show that the mentioned user won't be notified
uidu.mentions.noAccess.warning.message: {name} won't be notified as they have no access

uidu.mentions.unknow.user.error.description: Mention user name could not be found or look up failed
